title: Me2e Test Configuration
description: Test Configuration for the Me2e Library

docker-compose.description: Path to Docker-Compose file for the Microservice System containing definitions for all self-managed services. The file needs to be located in the `resources` folder.

mock-servers.description: HTTP web servers mocking third party services

settings.description: Settings for running the End-to-End tests.

docker-compose-version.description: Docker-Compose version to use. Default: V2

pull-policy.description: Policy on pulling Docker images. Default: MISSING

build-images.description: Whether to always build images before starting containers. Default: false

remove-images.description: Whether to remove images used by services after containers shut down. Default: NONE

remove-volumes.description: Whether to remove volumes after containers shut down. Default: true

health-timeout.description: Number of seconds to wait at most until containers are healthy. Only applicable if at least one healthcheck is defined in Docker-Compose. Default: 10

requests-config.description: Configuration of HTTP requests to Microservice containers.

retry-on-connection-failure.description: Whether to retry requests when a connectivity problem is encountered.

mock-server-config.description: Configuration for all Mock Server instances.

keystore-path.description: Path to the keystore containing the TLS certificate.

keystore-password.description: Password used to access the keystore. Required for TLS.

key-manager-password.description: Password used to access individual keys in the keystore. Required for TLS.

keystore-type.description: Type of the keystore. Required for TLS.

truststore-path.description: Path to the truststore to use for the Mock Server instances. Required for client authentication.

truststore-password.description: Password used to access the truststore. Required for client authentication.

truststore-type.description: Type of the truststore. Required for client authentication.

hostname.description: Hostname of the service to be represented by this Mock Server

stubs.description: List of paths to stub definitions. The files need to be located in `resources` folder.
